mapper.sql: user_id as userId, username as username, password as password, email as email, mobile as mobile, status as status, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, dept_id as deptId, parent_id as parentId, all_parent_id as allParentId, device_count as deviceCount, project_count as projectCount, head_url as headUrl, update_user as updateUser, term_of_validity as termOfValidity
mapper.select: select m.perms from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
select from sys_user as su where 1=1 and su.email = #{email} or su.mobile = #{mobile}
select from sys_user where parent_id = #{userId} or user_id = #{userId}
select from sys_user where all_parent_id like concat(#{allParentId},',%') or user_id = #{userId}
